CV Lab

Computer Vision
The University of Hong Kong

This is the homepage of the SIGMA Lab at the University of Sydney. We built this website ourselves in 2017 with Jekyll.

Our website is user-friendly, highly modularized and could be personalized very quickly! If you’d like to, you can build your own academic website for free based on our framework. The code of our website is available on Github. For commercial use, please contact Prof. Ouyang for details.
